articles.title: Fourth of July rooftop shooter kills six in Chicago suburb
articles.description: A gunman perched on a rooftop opened fire on families waving flags and children riding bikes at a Fourth of July parade on Monday, killing six and wounding more than 36 in the Chicago suburb of Highland Park.

articles.title: 2 law enforcement officers shot during a July Fourth festival in Philadelphia
articles.description: Two police officers were shot during a July Fourth celebration in Philadelphia, according to city police.
articles.content: Two police officers were shot during a July Fourth celebration in Philadelphia, according to city police.
